text:
お早う
小さなご
主人様
style: font-size: 15px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 57.93%;top: 6.34%;width: 8.51%;height: 10.24%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

text:
今晩は
よく寝れ
ました?
style: font-size: 15px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 19.73%;top: 45.49%;width: 9.89%;height: 11.10%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

font-size: 15px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 45.69%;top: 45.49%;width: 9.26%;height: 8.17%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

text:
それじゃ
朝食に
しましょ
style: font-size: 15px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 69.95%;top: 43.66%;width: 8.62%;height: 9.27%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

text:
今日は
何の夢を
みました?
